intro: Cnesmone laevis, commonly known as the smooth cnesmone, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its smooth, hairless stems and heart-shaped leaves. It produces showy yellow flowers with five petals, which bloom in the summer months. Cnesmone laevis is often found in dry, sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments.
